name: Dark Desire Mute 1
description:
Dark Desire Mute 1


This VISUAL NOVEL continues the life of the girls in the Cindy universe, even at different ages. This way you can explore all kind of kinks and pleasures and topics.
The game has NO audio and might include chapters from previous Dark Desire or Midnight Stories games, as demo. Please support the game, buy on Steam, so we can invest money in the audio. Free episodes without audio will be added in this free game.

Episode 01 - Money and Fangs 🧛‍♀️
- with 4 AI powered dialogs (Original ©, Fun 😁, Sarcastic 🙄 and Drama 🥵)
- play as Ashley-Monica or Ann-Isabella

Episode 03 - Cindy and Zac (Cindy 25 years old) - demo with audio, from Dark Desire 1, Episode 3 💛

💛 - Cindy's Story
🤖 - Arisa's Story
🧛‍♀️ - Monica's Story
💪 - Kevin's Story
